posts.post_title: SOLD - Clark Griffith Portrait - HINDU Brown - Great Price
posts.post_content:
⚾️ 1909-11 T206 Hindu Brown - Harry Bay - Southern Leaguer - PSA 2 GD Centered
Played for the Cleveland Naps and the Cincinnati Reds and was a concert pianist and bandleader.
Very clean back with no paper loss.

SOLD - Thank You

⚾️ 1909-11 T206 Hindu Brown Portrait - Clark Griffith (HOF) - SGC 1
The great Hall of Fame Player and Manager
Some paper loss at bottom of card back.  Card presents beautifully overall.

SOLD - Thank You
